info.description:
Type Number to select Page e.g. 300 (up / down arrow for prev / next)
Space / Mouse Click = Reveal
M = Mix (change channel 2 in the image shader to video for a more authentic feel)
Enter = Index
Gallery images from @horsenburger - https://www.horsenburger

    int pageCount;
};

int GetPageIndex( int pageIndex, int variation )
{
    if ( pageIndex < 0 || pageIndex >= pageCount )
        return 0;
    
    return pageNumbers[pageIndex].pageStart + (variation % pageNumbers[pageIndex].pageCount);
}

int GetPageNumber( int pageIndex )
{
    if ( pageIndex < 0 || pageIndex >= pageCount )
        return -1;
    
    return pageNumbers[pageIndex].pageNo;
}


uint StaticPageChar( int iPage, ivec2 coord )
{
    int valueIndex = coord.x / 4 + coord.y * 10;
    uint value = page[ iPage * 250 + valueIndex ];
    
    int index = coord.x % 4;
    
    return (value >> (index * 8)) & 0xffu;
}

int GetHeaderChar( int x, ivec3 pageDigits, int pageCurr, bool seeking )
{
    int pageH = pageDigits.x > 9 ? _SP : _0 + pageDigits[0];
    int pageT = pageDigits.y > 9 ? _SP : _0 + pageDigits[1];
    int pageU = pageDigits.z > 9 ? _SP : _0 + pageDigits[2];
    
    int pageCurrH = _0 + (pageCurr / 100) % 10;
    int pageCurrT = _0 + (pageCurr / 10) % 10;
    int pageCurrU = _0 + (pageCurr / 1) % 10;

    int seekingColor = CTRL_ALPHANUMERIC_WHITE;
    if ( seeking ) seekingColor = CTRL_ALPHANUMERIC_GREEN;
    
    int text[] = int[]( CTRL_ALPHANUMERIC_GREEN, _P, pageH, pageT, pageU, CTRL_ALPHANUMERIC_BLUE, CTRL_NEW_BACKGROUND, CTRL_ALPHANUMERIC_YELLOW, _S, _h, _a, _d, _e, _r, _T, _o, _y, _SP, seekingColor, CTRL_BLACK_BACKGROUND, pageCurrH, pageCurrT, pageCurrU, CTRL_ALPHANUMERIC_WHITE );
    if ( x < text.length() )
    {
        return text[x];
    }

    int dateCoord = x - 24;
    if ( dateCoord >= 0 )
    {
        return Teletext_FormatDate( dateCoord, iDate );    
    }
    
    return _SP;
}


void mainImage( out vec4 fragColor, in vec2 fragCoord )
{
    ivec2 iFragCoord = ivec2( fragCoord );
    
    ivec2 iPageDataPos = ivec2(0,26);

    if ( any( greaterThanEqual( iFragCoord, kScreenChars ) ) && iFragCoord != iPageDataPos )
    {
        fragColor = vec4( 0 );
        discard;
        return;
    }
            
    vec4 vPageCharData = texelFetch( iChannelData, iPageDataPos, 0 );
    int iPageCharCount = int(vPageCharData.x);
    
    int pageDigitPacked = int(vPageCharData.y);   
    ivec3 requestedPageDigits = ivec3( (pageDigitPacked >> 8) & 0xff, (pageDigitPacked >> 4) & 0xf, pageDigitPacked & 0xf);

    int iDisplayPageIndex = int( vPageCharData.z );

    if ( iFrame == 0 )
    {
        requestedPageDigits = ivec3(1,0,0);
        iDisplayPageIndex = 0;
    }

    if ( Key_IsPressed( iChannelKeyboard, KEY_ENTER ) )
    {
        requestedPageDigits[0] = 1;
        requestedPageDigits[1] = 0;
        requestedPageDigits[2] = 0;
    }
    else
    {
        int numKey = -1;
        for ( int digit=0; digit<=9; digit++ )
        {
            if ( Key_Typematic( iChannelKeyboard, KEY_0 + digit ) )
            {
                numKey = digit;
            }
        }

        if ( numKey >= 0 )
        {
            requestedPageDigits[iPageCharCount] = numKey;
            if ( iPageCharCount == 0 )
            {
                requestedPageDigits[1] = 10;
                requestedPageDigits[2] = 10;
            }            
            iPageCharCount = (iPageCharCount + 1) % 3;
        }
    }

    if ( Key_Typematic( iChannelKeyboard, KEY_UP ) )
    {
        int iNextPageIndex = (iDisplayPageIndex + 1) % pageCount;
        int iNextPageNo = GetPageNumber( iNextPageIndex );
        requestedPageDigits[0] = (iNextPageNo / 100) %10;
        requestedPageDigits[1] = (iNextPageNo / 10) %10;
        requestedPageDigits[2] = (iNextPageNo / 1) %10;
    }
    
    if ( Key_Typematic( iChannelKeyboard, KEY_DOWN ) )
    {
        int iNextPageIndex = (iDisplayPageIndex + pageCount - 1) % pageCount;
        int iNextPageNo = GetPageNumber( iNextPageIndex );
        requestedPageDigits[0] = (iNextPageNo / 100) %10;
        requestedPageDigits[1] = (iNextPageNo / 10) %10;
        requestedPageDigits[2] = (iNextPageNo / 1) %10;
    }
	
    
    // search for page
    int iRequestedPageNo = requestedPageDigits[0] * 100 + requestedPageDigits[1] * 10 + requestedPageDigits[2];
    
    int iDisplayPageNo = GetPageNumber( iDisplayPageIndex );
    int iDisplayPageVariation = 0;

    int iSearchPageNo = iDisplayPageNo;
    
    bool bSearching = (iDisplayPageNo != iRequestedPageNo );

    if ( iPageCharCount == 0 )
    {
        int iSearchPageIndex = int( iTime * 4. ) % pageCount;                        
        if ( bSearching )
        {
            iSearchPageNo = GetPageNumber( iSearchPageIndex );

            if ( iSearchPageNo == iRequestedPageNo )
            {
                iDisplayPageIndex = iSearchPageIndex;
                iDisplayPageNo = iSearchPageNo;
            }
        }        
    }
    
    iDisplayPageVariation = int(iTime / pageTurnTime);

    vPageCharData.x = float( iPageCharCount );
    vPageCharData.y = float( ((requestedPageDigits[0] & 0xf) << 8) + ((requestedPageDigits[1] & 0xf) << 4) + (requestedPageDigits[2] & 0xf ) );
    vPageCharData.z = float( iDisplayPageIndex );
    vPageCharData.w = 0.0f;
    
    iDisplayPageIndex = GetPageIndex( iDisplayPageIndex, iDisplayPageVariation );
    
    if ( iFragCoord == iPageDataPos )
    {        
        fragColor = vPageCharData;
        
        return;
    }
    
    ivec2 coord = ivec2( fragCoord );

    // Add Header
    if ( coord.y == 0 )
    {
        fragColor = vec4( GetHeaderChar(coord.x, requestedPageDigits, iSearchPageNo, bSearching ) );
    }
    else
    {    
        fragColor = vec4( StaticPageChar( iDisplayPageIndex, coord ) );
    }
}
